n0:createOracleProcedure.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "DEV"."SECURE_DML" is begin if TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI') not between '08:00' and '18:00' or TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DY') in ('SAT', 'SUN') then RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR(-20205, 'You may only make changes during normal office hours'); end if; end secure_dml; /
